name: PUPPET (SamuelBoxold)
description:
Game in developement

Controls:

XBOX Controller

Left Joystick- Move up down left and right. ;)

Select- Control Puppet

A- Action Button

         (Box Interaction:  continue to Walk into box and press A to push, Face Box side, stand still, and press A to climb)

X- Run

Y- Jump

R bumper- Weapon Toggle
